The buddings and blossomings of old truths: or, Severall practicall points of divinity, gathered out of that sacred evangelist, St. John, chap. the third, from verse 22. ad finem. By that worthy light and lamp of heaven, Alexander Gross, Bach. of Divinity, and late preacher of Ashberton, in Com. Devon. Grosse, Alexander, 1596?-1654.
[10], 454 p.
Printed by W. Bentley for Andrew Crook, at the signe of the green Dragon in Pauls Church-yard, London, : 1656.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "7ber [i.e. September]. 30.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
